Text: Great thanks, ill be seeding for a few months.
While your torrent information says that this is both an english and russian copy, mine is completely in russian. How do I set the language to english?

Nevermind, I found out through trial and error.

If you go to "rev" configuration file, you are able to change an entry from language=Russian to lanugage=English

to change language to english , go to instalation folder killingfloor , find and open REV file configuration settings and change line 
Language=Russian  to  Language=English 
save and you are done.. :)

ok when i go to rev config file i change Russian to English then when i save it says "cannot create Program Files (x86)/KillingFloor/rev.ini file make sure that the path is correct so when i go to it its correct HELP
